mapper.select: SELECT D.user_id AS userId, D.email, D.`name`, COUNT(A.report_id) AS totalReportCount, MAX(A.created_at) AS recentReportAt FROM report A LEFT JOIN feed B ON A.feed_id = B.feed_id LEFT JOIN `comment` C ON A.comment_id = C.comment_id INNER JOIN `user` D ON D.user_id = COALESCE(B.user_id, C.user_id) WHERE A.action_status = 1 AND D.user_status = 0 GROUP BY D.user_id, D.email, D.`name` HAVING COUNT(A.report_id) >= 5 ORDER BY recentReportAt DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE `user` SET user_status = 1 WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND user_status = 0
